title: Dataset Metadata
description: This form collects metadata about the dataset you are registering as well as the registration itself. Please ensure the fields below are completed accurately.

associations.title: Dataset Associations
associations.description: Please provide information about the organisation on behalf of which you are registering this dataset.

organisation_id.title: Record Creator Organisation
organisation_id.description: Please select the organisation on behalf of which you are registering this data.

approvals.title: Dataset Approvals
approvals.description: Please ensure that the following approvals are considered. Your dataset may not be fit for inclusion in the Data Store if it does not meet the following requirements.

ethics_registration.title: Dataset Registration Ethics and Privacy
ethics_registration.description: Does this dataset include any human data or require ethics/privacy approval for its registration? If so, have you included any required ethics approvals, consent from the participants and/or appropriate permissions to register this dataset in this information system?

ethics_access.title: Dataset Access Ethics and Privacy
ethics_access.description: Does this dataset include any human data or require ethics/privacy approval for enabling its access by users of the information system? If so, have you included any required consent from the participants and/or appropriate permissions to facilitate access to this dataset in this information system?

indigenous_knowledge.title: Indigenous Knowledge and Consent
indigenous_knowledge.description: Does this dataset contain Indigenous Knowledge? If so, do you have consent from the relevant Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander communities for its use and access via this data store?

export_controls.title: Export Controls
export_controls.description: Is this dataset subject to any export controls permits? If so, has this dataset cleared any required due diligence checks and have you obtained any required permits?

dataset_info.title: Dataset Information
dataset_info.description: Please provide information about this dataset, including the name, description, creation date and publisher information.

name.title: Dataset name
name.description: Please provide a readable name for the dataset.

description.title: Description
description.description: Please provide a more detailed description of the dataset. This should include the nature of the data, the intended usage, and any other relevant information.

access_info.title: Access Info
access_info.description: Please specify whether data is going to be stored in the Data Store, or referenced from an existing, externally hosted, source.

reposited.title: Data Storage
reposited.description: Is the data going to be stored in the Data Store?

uri.title: Dataset URI
uri.description: Provide the best URI of the externally hosted data.

description.title: Access Description
description.description: Provide information about how to access the externally hosted data, or other relevant notes.

publisher_id.title: Publisher
publisher_id.description: Please provide information about the organisation which published/produced this dataset. If your organisation produced this dataset, please select it again using the tool below.

created_date.title: Dataset Creation Date
created_date.description: The date on which this version of the dataset was produced or generated.

published_date.title: Dataset Publish Date
published_date.description: The date on which this version of the dataset was first published. If the data has never been published before - please use today's date.

license.title: Usage license
license.description: Please select a standard license for usage, by default it will be 'Copyright'.

preferred_citation.title: Preferred dataset citation
preferred_citation.description: If you would like to specify how this dataset should be cited, please use the checkbox below to indicate this preference, and enter your preferred citation in the text box.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Provide a list of keywords which describe your dataset [Optional].
